title: The Importance of Pali, the Language of Ancient Buddhism
description:
Core Buddhist teachings are preserved in the ancient Indian language Pali. Listen in as Aleix Ruiz-Falqués speaks about its structure, its significance, and opportunities to study it with him online.
Raj Balkaran is a scholar, online educator, and life coach. For information see rajbalkaran.com.
